topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack(R) Carrier Grade (Beta): HLM Post-Installation Tasks

body.p: After the HLM VM has been created, perform the following tasks before proceeding.

section.title: Configuring the FND-FIN role for the DCN cloud
section.p: Comment following services in ~/<cloud-name>/clouds/<cloud-name>/001/stage/ansible /roles/FND-FIN/tasks/main.yml before you run hdeploy

section.title: Enable logging for the hdeloy - ansible-playbook
section.p: Copy the ansible.cfg to the ~/<cloud-name>/clouds/<cloud-name>/001/stage/ansible/ directory before executing hdeploy.

section.title: Configure the LDP-CCN and LDP-CPN roles
section.p: To make sure that the LDP-CCN and LDP-CPN roles are created when LDAP integration is enabled.
Remove the double quotes in the definition.json file for the ldap_enabled variable.
If you have LDAP enabled in definition.json, you need to comment and add this command in the ldap.yml file.
